summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to health and safety, land use and zoning, environmental protection and historic preservation, amending Chapters 10.09, 25.05, 25.09, and other provisions of Title 25 of the Seattle Municipal Code, to declare that violations of the Land Use Code, the Environmentally Critical Areas ordinance, and the Environmental Policies and Procedures are public nuisances, and declaring that other listed actions are public nuisances.
committee: Housing, Community Development and Urban Environment
